Handle insurance offers and dealer blackjack check

handle_insurance.Rd

Offers insurance to all players if the dealer's upcard is an Ace, and settles insurance bets depending on whether the dealer has a Blackjack. Also reveals the dealer's hand if the upcard is a 10-value card and the dealer has Blackjack.

Usage

handle_insurance(dealer_hand, players, input_fun = readline, ai_prob = 0.5)

Arguments

dealer_hand

A blackjack_hand object for the dealer.

players

Named list of players (each with is_computer, coins, bets, etc.).

input_fun

Function for user input (default: readline).

ai_prob

Numeric, probability of AI buying insurance (default 0.5).

Value

A list with:

dealer_blackjack

Logical: whether the dealer has Blackjack.

players

Updated player list after insurance resolution.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Example: dealer showing Ace, with player and computer
players <- list(
  Alice = list(is_computer = FALSE, coins = 1000, bets = 100),
  Bot = list(is_computer = TRUE, coins = 1000, bets = 100)
)
dealer_hand <- new_blackjack_hand(c("A♠", "10♦"))
handle_insurance(dealer_hand, players)
} # }
